duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quality care and treatment to patients with dermatological conditions.
Collaborate with a team of medical staff and specialists to diagnose and treat dermatological conditions.
Participate in discussions around best practices, new technologies, and specialized treatment options related to dermatology.
Lead and guide the efforts of the medical team in delivering high-quality dermatological care.
Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies to enhance brand visibility and promote dermatological services.

education_certification.credential: ABD - American Board of Dermatology Certified
